readable.title: 3169276423_6918dd4da1
readable.content: A man and a woman wearing costume glasses ( with attached eyebrows , nose , and moustache ) and holding cigars . An older couple with Goucho Marx masks and fake cigars . An older couple with joke glasses and cigars . Man and woman wearing false eyebrows and noses . The man and woman are posing with fake glasses and moustaches .
